title: A remonstrance of divers remarkeable passages concerning the church and kingdome of Ireland, recommended by letters from the Right Honourable the Lords Justices, and Counsell of Ireland, and presented by Henry Jones Doctor in Divinity, and agent for the ministers of the Gospel in that kingdom, to the Honourable House of Commons in England
author: Jones, Henry, 1605-1682.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Godfrey Emerson, and William Bladen, and are to be sold at the signe of the Swan in Little-Brittain,
